metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8124 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon) before 2014.1.3 and 2014.2.x before 2014.2.1does not properly handle session records when using a db or memcachedsession engine, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of servicevia a large number of requests to the login page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8124` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openstack-dashboard - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu2
openstack-dashboard-ubuntu-theme - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu2
python-django-horizon - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu2
python-django-openstack - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: horizon package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu2').
